ygData.subject: RE: Mask of Deception and ultravision
ygData.msgSnippet: I m pretty sure I m indifferent when sneaking, but I ve done so much /conning in there I ve forgotten.  I ll try and remember to check tonight.
ygData.messageBody:
I'm pretty sure I'm indifferent when sneaking, but I've done so much
/conning in there I've forgotten. I'll try and remember to check tonight.

> From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
> With DE illusion up and the Carillon song, I can get my faction
> to the ogre
> merchants up to Amiable. Does sneaking with the Carillon get it
> to Warmly? If
> not then the illusion is better than sneaking when selling.
>
> Galtin of E'ci
> 33 bard
>
> > One point I'd like to make is that I've been using those
> vendors in Oggok a
> > lot lately, and if you sneak behind them and buy/sell your
> prices are a lot
> > better than as a DE, although sneaking is less convenient.
